page.title: 05HOUSING - Future Development
page.content: HOUSING - Future Developments Peacehaven is the only area for expansion because of land availability within a 10 mile radius of Brighton. It is proposed that there will be 200 more houses by the end of 1985 and another 200 by the end of 1986. The houses range from a two bed starter at Â£32,000 to 4 bed luxury properties with bathroom en suite at Â£65,000. In three years it is proposed that there will be 150 units on Harbour Heights. They say there will be bungalows, semi-detached and detached houses. In roughly five years in north Peacehaven there will be a development of 600 houses. In a decade there will be 1150 houses in the area of Peacehaven.
